topic.title: Any Indians here?
topic.body: Curious to know if there are any Indians / Tamils here

1617430409_15FbScWG2wGbwWdjTCfaq8rHHutm4.body: Fuck Narendra Modi; Fuck BJP; These guys are worse than Trump/Republicans. These guys are worse than Boris and Tori. Modu & BJP is tearing India apart. I can't even tweet about this because I am scared that police will come to home. Or some RSS (sort of like "proud boys" from America) goons will come to my home and beat up me, my mom and my dad.

1622981436_1Hkb9FSSux5SJFvuaQ5SKFnievTuj.body:
I learned this: The meaning of the word "left" and "center" are twisted. Interestingly "right" is exactly what it is.

People say that Biden is "centrist". And Bernie is "leftist". This is totally false. I would argue that Bernie is a centrist and Biden is Left. Please put your pitchforks and torches down and let me explain what I am trying to say.

The one who agrees with most people is actually centrist. Most of American people want:
* Medicare for all
* Tuition Free colleges
* Housing Rights
etc.

Now my boy Bernie is someone who *actually* fights for these things. So you see, he is an actual centrist. As in, he agrees with most of the population.

On the other hand Biden is a Leftist, he is pro-corporations and his views are extremists views (or at-least, that is how it should be treated. I mean he is Joe "Nothing Will Fundamentally Change" Biden). If there is a miracle and the labels gets interchanged, then I guess Bernie would have a better chance of winning.

But why is Bernie called leftist? The party is center-right. Bernie is center. So from their POV, Bernie is towards their left. So they label him leftist. But he is centrist in terms of what people need. 

Fuck Trump, Fuck Joe Biden. Both are more or less the same.

> [cnnterrorist1](#comment_9_1LCrrJAN3yLxK8YfAjuanHWQviQ23eRmiK): you are in full denial... in two stage : [...]

Ah, the age old "Venezuela" argument. Norway, Denmark, most European countries have these. But you don't see them tumbling like Venezuela. Why did you conveniently leave these countries out? Wouldn't help your argument?? 

Mother earth is vast and rich (not sure for how long). For millions of years our ancestors got everything for free. Food, Home, Education, etc. But humans only continued to flourish. To this day, most Animals and birds get their things for free. I don't see them collapsing.

Elementary, my dear Watson! Of course you would have known that, had you studied in one of these European countries. 

Do yourself a favor, and get educated about the world around you a little bit :) You can worry about wiping out Indians later.

We are harming other in the name of god, you hippocrite

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1056_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): Which does not mean god approved everything that human suggest is god approved. Or that all gods are bad, obviously. And keep that invective for yourself please.

You know, you should try to follow your own advice, at-least, sometimes :P

> [superfunman](#comment_9_1AsbbeCZSZfVydJdBqsUtZJu2ws8pQqryj): The only way to see God is through His Son Jesus Christ - you may want to become like God, but if you analyse what some people are saying here - that Lucifer tryed to become God - he was thrown from Heaven to earth, and will be judged by God in the end and thrown into the lake of fire.  If you think you can become "gods" you are wrong - no one except God is God and no one else can be Him (or Her if you are that way inclined) You can follow the prophets all you like, but they all (every single one) talked about Jesus and what He means in the grand scheme of things.  There is no one who is perfect enough to be God (I don't have my bible handy or I'd give you a verse)(for everything I say here) and the only way to get into heaven - no matter how you scheme or plan - is through the blood of Jesus Christ.  I know no one likes to admit that, but if you do some real research into heaven and how to get there, Jesus will come up.  He will forgive your sin - we all sin, and fall short of God, so we have to be forgiven of the sin by Jesus' grace - then we can meet God and enjoy Heaven with Him - it's gonna be so cool, Heaven, I can't wait!! But saying that - I have to finish my mission here on earth, and He will call me home to Heaven to be with Him when my time comes, because I believe in Him and trust Him to do what He said He will do :)

Jesus Christ, Allah, Siva, Krishna, Thor, etc -  these are nothing more than mere human imagination & inventions.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1073_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): https://www.beliefnet.com/faiths/christianity/galleries/4-compelling-historical-documents-that-prove-jesus-existed.aspx [...]

There "may" have been a man named Jesus. But he definitely did not turn water to wine or magically create breads. You see there is this thing called physics. It just won't allow it. :)

If people believe that, its definitely because we have "religious" conmen. Self-proclaimed men of "god". https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8r-e2NDSTuE

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1078_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): If christian believe that God according to Bible created animals, human, why not be able to create wine, that would be much more simple and Jesus himself claimed that his abilities are from his father in whose name he came to Earth as promised when things got wrong in the garden of Eden.

Well, remember when I mentioned this new little thing called "Physics", it wouldn't allow humans animals to be manifested out of thin air either. You see these things are born when a member of the a species impregnates the female of the same species. That is just how reality works. The same thing applies to resurrection. A person cannot simply die and wake up 3 days later. 

Religion is just a mass delusion born of ignorance. I am not only talking about christian here. Every single religion is a complete bullshit. If there is a god, at the very least, we all should agree he/she is undoubtedly evil.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1079_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): cosmos does not contain only thin air [...]

> cosmos does not contain only thin air

Oh, now you want to talk science? 

> true, man can not do it, but as i already said in my previous comment, if God is able to create living organism, he may be able to repair or re-create damaged organism

Ah so now I get it. So God is real. There really is an invisible being up in the sky noting down everything that I do do everyday & every second of my life so he can judge me after I die. Makes complete sense now. How could I have not seen this all these years?

> current state of the things has the reason and is temporary

Wow, you opened my eyes yet again. The "reason" is good enough. Not vague / arbitrary at all. And yeah, it is just temporary. This has just been happening ever since that damn Adam and Eve ate the apple. Only if God has foreseen something as complex as eating an apple and not created the Apple Tree, we would have nothing to worry about, would we?

THANK GOD, that I am not an atheist anymore. He has put me on the righteous path. Now, I wonder which is the true god. Is it Yahweh, Allah, Krishna, Shiva or Tifitti? If only it was possible to identify which god is the real god, things will be much simpler.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1084_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): please delete your duplicate post if possible [...]

Sorry, can't delete a post.

> yes it is, if you are not lazy and research, try, experience, you would discover what makes sense

This is rich coming from you ðŸ¤£

> that would solve nothing, have you been thinking about this before submitting your seemingly big mouth comment?

Oops, someone is triggered. ðŸ˜

Jeusu, Allah, Siva and a lot of ther gods and godmen have said some really, really, stupid things ðŸ¤£

> The last several thousand years is

According to bible the earth is only 6000 years old ðŸ˜‚ ðŸ¤£ðŸ˜‚ ðŸ¤£ðŸ˜‚ ðŸ¤£ðŸ˜‚ ðŸ¤£. That is a "few" thousand years. Not "several". 

I don't know man, "The Creator" sound like really, really stupid guy to me, if not evil. I am a programmer, if I don't like some behavior of my program, I will just make modifications so it behaves how I expect it to behave. No clue why an "all-powerful, all-knowing, omnipotent & super-intelligent" being can't even do that.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1085_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): mouse hover over your duplicate post text and on the left should appear pencil which you click [...]

Thanks a lot, I did not know that is how delete worked. Well, what do you know? Talking to you was indeed useful, I learnt something new today.

> or the things You do not understand

In a way you are right, I don't understand. But not because I lack knowledge, its because it is purely illogical. I am not a native English speaker either. English is my 3rd language. 

>  first Biblical verse does not say anything about the start date,

You are right, there is no start date. But this is a result of interpreting (a literal interpretation)  certain events and their timelines as mentioned in bible. 

I don't think either of us are going to change an other's mind. You believe in God, I believe in science. Apologies if I hurt your feelings. Let's agree to disagree. Adios, dear netizen. I will leave you be.

1628132492_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: Why would you do such a thing? The whole point of ZeroNet is anonymity. Why do you want to make yourselves known?

> [gitcenter](#comment_1534_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): No. This is a terrible and a standard mistake. Perhaps a better comparison is that ZeroNet is like IRC.

If you were not aware of accessing it through Tor. That is kind of the 3 main selling points for ZN (as evidenced from SN's own website.).

And only in the spirits of communication, this is like IRC. But It's nothing like it in terms of tech. ZN is distributed.

> [gitcenter](#comment_1534_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): No. This is a terrible and a standard mistake. Perhaps a better comparison is that ZeroNet is like IRC.

> [styromaniac@kxoid.bit](#comment_23_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8BdnSv3): GitCenter is a ZeroNet contributor. He knows already.

Okay, I feel like a dumb idiot now. My sincere apologies. I can't bash about politicians, here in India, on twitter / facebook. My own relatives will come after me. I have seen a dear friend of mine got beaten up by RSS Goons (To compare, these people are like Proud Boys of USA) because he posted some shit about BJP (the current ruling party). This is sort of my safe-space where I can vent out my frustrations. I understand this will almost always be just like shouting into the void. But at-least I have got an outlet. So for me anonymity was a big selling point. I retract my previous statements.
